price: 35. Markaasaan ka soo bixinnay halkaa wixii ku jiray ee mu’miniin ah.
arabic: فَأَخۡرَجۡنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-akhrajnā man kāna fīhā mina al-mu'minīna
